name: pouchdb-find

scripts.dev: browserify test/test.js > test/test-bundle.js && npm run dev-server
scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && browserify lib/index.js -o dist/pouchdb.find.js && npm run min
scripts.jshint: jshint -c .jshintrc lib/*.js test/test.js test/test-utils.js test/tests/*
